snippet: The United Nations commissioner for human rights, Navi Pillay, expressed dismay on Friday over the lack of Security Council action on the killings and human rights abuses in Syria.
abstract: United Nations commissioner for human rights, Navi Pillay, expresses dismay over lack of Security Council action on killings and human rights abuses in Syria, where death toll has surpassed 60,000.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations commissioner for human rights, Navi Pillay, expressed dismay on Friday over the lack of Security Council action on the killings and human rights abuses in Syria.

headline.seo: United Nations Commissioner Urges Action on Syria
